name: Industrial Coatings World.com
tag_list: industrial-coatings, low-friction-coatings, non-stick-coatings, wear-resistant-coatings, corrosion-resistant-coatings, teflon, ptfe, pfa, graphite, mos2, hard-anodize, electroless-nickel, peek, pvd, thermal-spray, ceramic-coating
overview:
Industrial Coatings World is an online publication and surface engineering community of machine designers, product engineers and equipment manufacturers.

Its readership includes both coating suppliers and audiences from these industries: aerospace, agriculture, architecture, automotive, chemical processing, cutting, dental, electronics, extrusion, food processing, machining, marine, medical, molding, packaging, paper, pharmaceutical, plastics, printing, rubber, and others.

Articles, e-newsletters, and video are presented to delight, entertain and inform, always in an easy-to-understand format.
